Interface IPublisher

    • Method Detail

      • init

        PublisherConfig init(PublisherConfig config)
                     throws DotPublishingException
        Method to configure any required value before to process this Publisher
        Parameters:
        config - Object that have the main configuration values for the processing of this Publisher
        Returns:
        Object with this Publisher configuration info
        Throws:
        DotPublishingException - If there is an exception while this publisher is initialized.
